text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Kawakami-senpai～, I knew it was impossible! That tree is taller 
than the second floor! I'll go get someone from the office.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'll just rewrite my report if you can't get it. 
What if you get hurt by being so reckless?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't be shy! I'm a princess, remember? This height is a 
piece of cake for a princess like me.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna do it!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: I want to be a princess―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: A cute, sparkling princess that everyone admires.

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text:
Hey――You ！！！！ 
Don't bully the weak! I'm gonna beat your ass!!!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text:
Waa, she appeared!! The ferocious Uma Musume!! 
Run, before she kicks our ass!!!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text:
Who do you think you are calling yourself princess! You're a 
tyrant! A tyrant!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
I just got another call from someone complaining that she 
made a kid cry. I don't know why she's so violent……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Father
text_block_list.text:
She wants to be a princess, right? Why don't you show her 
some examples of being a princess?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami's Mother
text_block_list.text:
See? The princess in this book is gentle and quiet, right? If you 
want to be a princess, you have to be a good, quiet girl.

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text: (Hmmph～ Mom doesn't understand what it truly means to be a princess――)

text_block_list.name: TV
text_block_list.text:
"Princess, present! Brilliantly, Gracefully, and Valiantly! 
Bakusou Mougi☆Princess Fighter!!"

text_block_list.name: Young Kawakami
text_block_list.text:
See! Even a tomboy can be a princess. I'll be a princess! I'll be 
the strongest princess!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I will become a princess― A gorgeous, graceful, brave 
princess!!

It's been a little over a month since I arrived at Tracen 
Academy as a new trainer. I was walking around the school, 
trying to familiarize myself to the area―

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Doryaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait, wha… get out of the way～～!!

An Uma Musume came running at a furious speede. 
She avoided me with great reaction time and―
She went towards the wall, and launched herself in the air!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……Whew, that was a close one♪

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my goooooooood!!?!?!?, I've done it! Wha wha wha wha, 
what should I do, I messed up!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Kawakami-senpai～, are you okay?――

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh shit! There's a huge hole in the wall!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's why I tried to stop you. 
You just jumped without even listening to me!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Uwww…… no, it's not - it's not supposed to be like this!!
Ka～wa～ka～mi～!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Why are you such a brute, Princess Kawakami! Making such 
a huge hole in the school building, things like this have never 
happened before!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
No! I'm sorry, I didn't mean to! There is 
a reason that is deeper than the ocean…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Come on, I'll hear your excuses in the student council office! 
Now keep quiet, and follow me!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oh～～no～～!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oh no! Let's go after them!

Not knowing what was going on, I followed them to the student 
council office where Kawakami Princess was taken to.
choice_data_list: So, what was going on earlier?
So, what was going on earlier?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
My report got caught in a tree, and 
Kawakami-san tried to retrieve it.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: We were trying to stop her because it was dangerous……

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm……… in other words the destruction of the wall was not 
intentional, but a result of an attempt to help a friend?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
That's right.…… I just wanted to retrieve this report that got 
caught on the tree……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Scarlet worked hard last night to write this report.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
And yet, a mere gust of wind snatched it away! As a princess, I 
could not sit and do nothing about it!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Even if that's the case, why did you try to jump? Why not just 
find a ladder or some other tool?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: But, you see…… you are a princess only if you solve things with your bare hand…… You know what they say, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: 'In a pinch, twist with the punches!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: There is no such adage! Geez, even that other day…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Ah～, she's getting scolded. It's cool that senpai can't 
leave someone in trouble, but it's not a good thing to leave 
a hole in the wall.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I wish I had stopped her right then and there.…… Well, I guess 
that wouldn't stop her, she's Kawakami-san after all.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Sigh～…… As expected, Air Groove-san 
is not an easy one to deal with～ ……

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Kawakami-san! Are you ok?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
You both…… I'm fine, I told them it wasn't on purpose. 
The student council will make arrangements for the repairs. 
It's just―

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's just―?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text:
Instead, as punishment for needlessly adding to 
the student council's workload, I've been assigned 
to do chores……

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: First, I need to gather unwanted posters around the school～!

This was my first encounter with the energetic Runaway 
Princess―Kawakami Princess.
